an1.1:1.2: Ngarl ngan-ya kuttuck quadga-kartaga. E-jow gyne gorah nunn-o-luck Bridiyar-Kaartijen quadga be jin bar-dook Sāvatthi bura Jeta's Grove, Anāthapindika’s monastery.
an1.1:1.3: Ponto nunn-o-luck Bridiyar-Kaartijen yaller-wingaween kwabba winyarn-ang, “Kwabba-winyarn-ang!”
an1.1:2.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel jinnunger ally mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck jinnunger ung ghain yorga. Nunn-o-luck jinnunger ung ghain yorga mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart.
an1.2:1.1: Kwaba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel gurdor ally mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck gurdor ung ghain yorga. Nunn-o-luck gurdor ung ghain yorga mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart.
an1.3:1.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel taamil ally mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck taamil ung ghain yorga. Nunn-o-luck taamil ung ghain yorga mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart.
an1.4:1.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel pacianana ally mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck pacianana ung ghain yorga. Nunn-o-luck pacinana ung ghain yorga mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart.
an1.5:1.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel purrong ally mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck purrong ung ghain yorga. Nunn-o-luck purrong ung ghain yorga mia-ang ghain maaman-ang kaart.
an1.6:1.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel jinnunger ally mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck jinnunger ung ghain maaman. Nunn-o-luck jinnunger ung ghain maaman mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart.
an1.7:1.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel gurdor ally mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck gurdor ung ghain maaman. Nunn-o-luck gurdor ung ghain maaman mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart.
an1.8:1.1: Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel taamil ally mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck taamil ung ghain maaman. Nunn-o-luck taamil ung ghain maaman mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart.
an1.9:1.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel pacianana ally mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck pacianana ung ghain maaman. Nunn-o-luck pacinana ung ghain maaman mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart.
an1.10:1.1: “Kwabba-winyarn-ang, nad-joo arn-dinyung ki-an meeal ghain ghaingel purrong ally mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart mokin nunn-o-luck purrong ung ghain maaman. Nunn-o-luck purrong ung ghain maaman mia-ang ghain yorga-ang kaart.
